item.title: Your Application At The Edge [S01E04]
item.description: Intro In this blog, I will show you how to use the Monitoring Tools within Control Centre to analyse user traffic stats as well as how to use WebPageTest to understand the Website performance. Whatâ€™s Hot? Have you checked the previous Your Application at the Edge [S01E03] blog post? It details how to use Ion to deliver the HTML page and other static assets to end-users by enabling the CDN features and capabilities such as caching provided by Akamai.
